projects.title: ReflectLLM
projects.description: An advanced tool for thought app that empowers users to process their thoughts and emotions, trigger identification, pattern understanding, and offers personalized tools for enhanced emotional control

projects.title: NutriChat
projects.description: An LLM-powered personalized recipes. Craft meals tailored to your goals & preferences with advanced language processing & machine learning. Eat smarter, live healthier.

projects.title: SnackSwift
projects.description: Order delicious snacks & appetizers with detailed nutrition info in this Swift & SwiftUI iOS app. Make informed choices & track your intake - Snack swift is your healthy snacking companion.

projects.title: MMA Simulator
projects.description: Simulate complex MMA matches with strategic AI in this Java and MySQL powered CLI program. Create and manage fighters, experience the thrill of the octagon, and strategize like a champion.

projects.title: Hospital Management System
projects.description: Boost efficiency & prioritize patient well-being. Manage appointments, records, billing, and more with lightning speed, empowering your staff to deliver exceptional care, every time.

services.title: iOS App Development
services.description: Skilled in building iOS apps with Xcode, Swift, SwiftUI, UIKit, and CoreData. Proficient in using Swift's features like optionals, closures, async await, and managing data with CoreData.

services.title: Project Mangement
services.description: Professional experienced in leading teams and delivering 3 successful projects. Skilled in communication with stakeholders, using SDLC and agile methods, and BRD and FRD documentation.

services.title: RestAPI Development
services.description: Experienced in making RestAPIs with SpringBoot, flask and Django, skilled in managing backend tasks, and knowledgeable about creating endpoints and processing HTTP requests.

services.title: Machine Learning
services.description: Skilled in fine tuning ML models, optimizing prompts, and using LangChain framework for LLM-powered apps. Building apps with context awareness and retrieval generation techniques.

services.title: Database Management
services.description: Skilled in planning, creating, and managing databases, with experience in MySQL, PostgreSQL, and MongoDB. Proficient in designing schemas, establishing relationships, and managing keys

services.title: UI/UX Design
services.description: Skilled in design and developing UI and UX for app and websites, for a non-obtrusive experience for users. Experienced in creating wireframes, and prototypes and complying with Human interface guidelines
